body_html: I am interested in serving a retrained-inception graph as well. Is there a way to 'serve' the .pb retrained file that is an output of retrain.py and is used in label_image? Or a way to serve label_image pointing at a .pb file?

body: I am interested in serving a retrained-inception graph as well. Is there a way to 'serve' the .pb retrained file that is an output of retrain.py and is used in label_image? Or a way to serve label_image pointing at a .pb file?
